# MR-TRAM
<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of MR.TRAM is to estimate causal effect using multiple ancestries. Using SEM, MR-TRAM provides better understanding of pleiotropy based on the zero relevance mode.

## Installation
You can install the released / development version of MR.TRAM from github with:

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("universe77/MR.TRAM")
```

## Example
A basic example is provided in vignettes
